1.0.name: wordpress/g4b-photo-gallery
1.0.description:
G4B Photo Gallery is a free, flexible plugin for Wordpress. It provides a simple and effective way to include a complete photo album anywhere on you blog, just by typing in a keyword.

Live Demo

Plugin Features:

  • Easily customize with CSS
  • Manage and create albums
  • Upload, edit and delete photos
  • Set thumbnail and full view sizes
  • Supports cropping both thumbnail and full view
  • Supports PHP 4 and PHP 5
